explanation: Monica claims she was on a video call with her mother from 7 PM until 10 PM. But Clue 3 reveals the call actually ended at 8:15 PM â€” nearly two hours earlier than she claimed. She lied to cover her movements after the call. Clue 2 shows Monica's car returned to the office parking lot at 10:25 PM and she re-entered the building at 10:28 PM. Clue 1 confirms only Monica, Alan, and the vacationing office manager have keys to the filing cabinet. Monica returned to the office and used her key to steal the notes.
funFact: Corporate espionage during mergers and acquisitions is so common that many companies now use decoy documents to catch leakers.
